name: Muffin Psyco
description:
Note: This is one of my oldest game so expect it to be trash

You are a person, A mafia (That hates muffins) Stole your favorite thing in the world (Muffins) And there's no other place to get muffins (Dumb cupcakes) so it's your mission to kill all the mafia members and get your muffins back 

WASD to move

Point and click to shoot

1/2 to switch Guns (The Shotgun bullets are faster)

Not mobile-friendly 

Don't play on map "Pain" if you are sensitive to flashing lights (You have been warned)

Find the secret key to make the map "Pain" stop flashing:))))

To change Lightsaber color press one of these three keys, IOP.
